forecast.day_comments: A 30 percent chance of light snow, mainly after 2am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 17. Light and variable wind.  Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow showers likely, mainly after 3pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 24. Calm wind becoming southwest 5 to 8 mph in the afternoon.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
